00047 
00048 typedef struct tag_au
00049 {
00050         size_t          actualSize;
00051         size_t          reportedSize;
00052         void            *actualAddress;
00053         void            *reportedAddress;
00054         char            sourceFile[40];
00055         char            sourceFunc[40];
00056         unsigned int    sourceLine;
00057         unsigned int    allocationType;
00058         bool            breakOnDealloc;
00059         bool            breakOnRealloc;
00060         unsigned int    allocationNumber;
00061         struct tag_au   *next;
00062         struct tag_au   *prev;
00063 } sAllocUnit;
00064 
00065 typedef struct
00066 {
00067         unsigned int    totalReportedMemory;
00068         unsigned int    totalActualMemory;
00069         unsigned int    peakReportedMemory;
00070         unsigned int    peakActualMemory;
00071         unsigned int    accumulatedReportedMemory;
00072         unsigned int    accumulatedActualMemory;
00073         unsigned int    accumulatedAllocUnitCount;
00074         unsigned int    totalAllocUnitCount;
00075         unsigned int    peakAllocUnitCount;
00076 } sMStats;

00152 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 // Macros -- "Kids, please don't try this at home. We're trained professionals here." :)
00154 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 
00156 #include "nommgr.h"
00157 #define new             (m_setOwner  (__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__),false) ? NULL : new
00158 #define delete          (m_setOwner  (__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__),false) ? m_setOwner("",0,"") : delete
00159 #define malloc(sz)      m_allocator  (__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,m_alloc_malloc,sz)
00160 #define calloc(sz)      m_allocator  (__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,m_alloc_calloc,sz)
00161 #define realloc(ptr,sz) m_reallocator(__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,m_alloc_realloc,sz,ptr)
00162 #define free(ptr)       m_deallocator(__FILE__,__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,m_alloc_free,ptr)
